commits.subject: docs: add UI component hierarchy reference document
commits.body:
Create comprehensive documentation of UI component organization
including component trees, state management patterns, initialization
flows, and file references for both Pricing and Intercompany modes.

commits.body:
Note that new workflow tests need validation by running in browser
to verify result paths match actual model output structure.

commits.subject: feat: expand Testing Lab with Models 2-6 and Long-term Value tests
commits.body:
- Add 8 workflow scenarios for Models 2-6 (total: 18 scenarios)
- Add 14 Long-term Value test cases (NPV, IRR, Payback)
- Add new assertions for Models 2-6 calculations
- Add tabbed UI: Workflow Tests | Long-term Value Tests
- Update documentation

commits.subject: Merge pull request #91 from devmade-ai/claude/review-ui-alignment-6VCGS
commits.body: feat: align UI with tool goals - add long-term value dimension

commits.subject: docs: update session notes and add accounting comparison idea to TODO
feat: align UI with tool goals - add long-term value dimension
commits.body:
UI now fully delivers on all 5 dimensions promised in Mode 2 goals:
- Financial Impact, Tax Efficiency, Accounting, Compliance, Long-term Value

Changes:
- Add NPV, IRR, payback to comparison view metrics
- Add Long-term Value panel to results display (both perspectives)
- Auto-generate projections when saving comparisons
- Reframe Options Overview: "Which structure creates the best outcome?"
- Make header tagline mode-aware (shows relevant goal per mode)

commits.subject: Merge pull request #90 from devmade-ai/claude/review-tool-goals-Fo2sg
commits.body: docs: refine tool goals with clearer user-focused language

commits.subject: docs: refine tool goals with clearer user-focused language
commits.body:
- Update System Purpose section in CLAUDE.md with goal table
- Add "What It Helps You Answer" section to BUSINESS_GUIDE.md
- Remove legacy "common ownership" framing from financial_models doc
- Define "best deal" across 5 dimensions (financial, tax, accounting, compliance, long-term)
- Add Recommendation Summary feature idea to TODO.md

Mode 1 goal: "Find the price range where you hit your margin AND your client sees clear ROI"
Mode 2 goal: "Compare structures to find the best deal for both you and your client"
